climatePledgeFriendly.details: USDA Organic products are grown and processed according to standards addressing soil and water quality, among other factors.

features: Nourishing & Refreshing: Soothe and calm your skin with our Aloe Vera Toner, providing instant relief from redness and irritation, leaving your skin feeling soft and hydrated. It hydrates oily & combination skin without over drying and maintains oil-water balance.

Natural Beauty: Nourish your skin deeply with the powerful nutrients of our Pure Aloe Vera Toner, promoting a glowing and radiant complexion. Revive your skin's radiance with our 99.8% Aloe Vera Toner that replenishes and improves skin tone, texture, and elasticity without additives or thickeners.

Smooth & Restore: Experience a rejuvenating boost as our Aloe Toner replenishes and revives tired-looking skin, making you feel vibrant and youthful. Effortlessly smooth and soften your skin texture with our Aloe Vera Toner, for a touchable velvety complexion.

Made Within 12 Hours of Harvest: At Aloderma, our skincare is rooted in the earth. Our Aloe is processed on-site and turned into final products within hours of leaving the fields to ensure that we capture the natural power of Aloe Vera in every product we make.

Aloderma: We are a family run farm-to-face skin care line focused on producing and creating high-quality organic aloe vera-based products in an ecologically friendly way. We grow organic aloe vera on our own farms and manufacture all of our products in our factory, which are certified USDA and European Union organic by ECOCERT. Aloderma has over 20 years of working with Aloe providing high quality and affordable products for beauty, health and wellness.
body.description: The Many Uses of Aloe Vera Benefits of Aloe Vera Gel For Skin For all Skin Types - Suitable for sensitive, dry, normal, combination and oily skin types.Skin Exfoliator - Massaging the gel into skin can help remove dead skin cells and clear pores.Soothing Properties - Aloe gel helps soothe irritation and redness.Moisturize Your Skin- Aid in the natural rejuvenation of your skin with Aloe. Apply as a facial mask and let the magic happen while you sleep.Treat Sunburns - Helps soothe and cool the irritation. Frequent application can help deliver the most relief.Diminish Dullness - Aloe gel helps diminish the appearance of dark spots, acne scars and dark circles.Help alleviate Stretch Marks - Aloe gel can help alleviate the appearance fine lines. Use throughout the day to help drive results.Make-Up Remover- Aloe is a naturally hydrating make-up remover that can help remove harsh chemicals in one swipe. Benefits of Aloe Vera Gel For Nails Keep it Clean- Aloe Vera's cleaning properties help cleanse dirt and residue from nailsStrengthen Nails- Daily application of aloe gel helps prevent nail breakage while hydrating and nourishing cuticles Safety Shield- Aloe helps promote healing of the sensitive cuticles and nail bedEnhance Nail luster- Aloe gel applied daily helps maximize the luster Benefits Aloe Vera Gel For Hair Hydrating powers- Aloe gel helps hydrate the scalp to combat dandruff and dry, irritated skinSuper Soft and Shiny Hair- Aloe is a natural alternative to chemical based shampoo and conditionersAccelerate Hair Growth- Vitamins C, E, B-12, folic acid, and choline work together to strengthen hair and promote its growth

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ALODERMA Pure Aloe Vera Gels & Juice ALODERMA Pure Aloe products are the first step in discovering Fresh Aloe Skin Care. Utilizing fresh organic aloe processed within 12 hours of harvest, ALODERMA Pure Aloe products truly are Fresh Aloe Skin Care. Fresh Aloe can be used for after sun care, cuts and scrapes, to hair and facial masks. They can be used throughout the day for an extra hydration and to sooth irritated skin. Made with organic aloe juice, never from concentrate, ALODERMA and the natural power of aloe will help to restore your skin to its youthful appearance.

NATURE’S SOLUTION Containing 96-99.8% fresh organic aloe juice, our ALODERMA Aloe Gels and Pure Hydrators use Aloe Vera in its natural state to instantly infuse skin with deep hydration and essential nutrients. ALODERMA skincare is rooted in the earth. No water, freeze-dried aloe powder, or concentrates are used making our gels and juices the perfect first step in any skin care routine or as a natural product throughout the day. HAND HARVESTED At ALODERMA, Fresh Aloe skincare means that we control all aspects on our organic farms from when Aloe goes in the ground to when it is harvested to ensure we naturally grow the happiest plants all year round. Our Aloe is processed and turned into final products within 12 hours of leaving the fields to ensure that we capture the highest levels of the 230 natural nutrients found in Aloe Vera. VEGAN AND CRUELTY-FREE At ALODERMA, we are committed to bringing you quality products without damaging the environment. Both vegan and cruelty-free, our Aloe Brightening Mask is made using SATT proprietary technology and does not contain Aloe powder concentrates, alcohol, parabens, mineral oil, GMOs, hormones, or sulfates.

The Many Uses of Aloe Vera Benefits of Aloe Vera Gel For Skin For all Skin Types - Suitable for sensitive, dry, normal, combination and oily skin types.Skin Exfoliator - Massaging the gel into skin can help remove dead skin cells and clear pores.Soothing Properties - Aloe gel helps soothe irritation and redness.Moisturize Your Skin- Aid in the natural rejuvenation of your skin with Aloe. Apply as a facial mask and let the magic happen while you sleep.Treat Sunburns - Helps soothe and cool the irritation. Frequent application can help deliver the most relief.Diminish Dullness - Aloe gel helps diminish the appearance of dark spots, acne scars and dark circles.Help alleviate Stretch Marks - Aloe gel can help alleviate the appearance fine lines. Use throughout the day to help drive results.Make-Up Remover- Aloe is a naturally hydrating make-up remover that can help remove harsh chemicals in one swipe. Benefits of Aloe Vera Gel For Nails Keep it Clean- Aloe Vera's cleaning properties help cleanse dirt and residue from nailsStrengthen Nails- Daily application of aloe gel helps prevent nail breakage while hydrating and nourishing cuticles Safety Shield- Aloe helps promote healing of the sensitive cuticles and nail bedEnhance Nail luster- Aloe gel applied daily helps maximize the luster Benefits Aloe Vera Gel For Hair Hydrating powers- Aloe gel helps hydrate the scalp to combat dandruff and dry, irritated skinSuper Soft and Shiny Hair- Aloe is a natural alternative to chemical based shampoo and conditionersAccelerate Hair Growth- Vitamins C, E, B-12, folic acid, and choline work together to strengthen hair and promote its growth Interesting Aloe Vera Facts Use gel with any of your other favorite products to create a synergistic blend Aloe Gel is full of nutrients that skin easily absorbs Aloe Vera gel has over 230 nutrients that nourish skin, returning it to its natural state Aloe Vera can be applied to any part of the body ALODERMA Aloe Gel is made using a natural process that helps maintain the active properties of Aloe

ALODERMA Organic Pure Aloe Vera Gel 99% - 45 grams ALODERMA Organic Pure Aloe Vera Gel 99% - 114 grams ALODERMA Organic Pure Aloe Vera Gel 99% - 200 grams ALODERMA 98.8 % Fresh Organic Aloe Vera Vitality Juice Skin Hydrator - 240ml ALODERMA Organic Pure Aloe Vera Gel 99% - 300 grams Volume 45 Grams 114 Grams 200 Grams 240 Milliliters 300 Grams Form Gel Gel Gel Liquid Gel Organic Aloe Percentage by Weight 99% 99% 96% 99.8% 99%

About ALODERMA American Global Health Group (AGHG) launched the ALODERMA brand in 2012 with the mission of creating quality Aloe Vera based skin care products using only Fresh Organic Aloe Vera juice straight from our owned and operated ECOCERT Organic plantations in Southern China. AGHG has been operating for over 20 years and pioneered eco-origin Aloe Vera growing in regions in which we operate. By utilizing American best practices in sustainable agriculture and our deep appreciation and respect for the culture and people in the areas in which we operate, we were able to fuse the best parts of our American background with millennia old Chinese farming techniques and newly developed technology to create a unique Sino-American approach to agriculture and skin care. AGHG has developed patented SATT process for optimizing the freshness of aloe going into our skin care products to ensure all Aloe Vera going into ALODERMA aloe is the freshest and most bioactive aloe possible in skin care and thus launched Fresh Aloe Skin Care. All ALODERMA products are made using a minimum of 65% Fresh Organic Aloe Vera Juice that is processed within 12 Hours of Harvest. We never use concentrates or powder, do not add water to any of our products. We are committed to only make pure aloe products manufactured at the source with the finest ingredients possible. FDA Disclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like how this product was very hydrating and easy to apply also drys fairly quickly and is non-greasy.Using as a moisturizer and will use from this point on as a moisturizer.I also purchased a second supply, it is that good....highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great skin calmer
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a specific issue: after being out in the sun I'd wake in the middle of the night with an itchy scalp. It took me a while to realize that this was due to a balding head! A little squirt of this aloe lotion rubbed between my hands and worked into my hair brought immediate cooling relief and I could get back to sleep. Very effective, non-irritating product for your skin issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars "aloe barbadensis leaf juice"
reviews.reviewText: aloe leaf juice is not the same as aloe fillet, which is the purest form. aloe leaf juice could be the entire leaf including the green outer parts and the less desirable mucus.that's said. it does feel nice on the skin, and my skin feels nice and smooth after i apply it. good enough for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I do not normally write reviews but for this product I absolutely had to do so.. this is now the best product in my skin care !! I am pushing 50 and this product has saved me so much money it does everything it says it will. It has improved the overall look of my skin it feels tighter and more nourished it has decreased the look of fine lines and my skin has a healthier glow to it. This product improved the look of dark circles and discoloration. Over all improvements of my skin 10 out of 10 for sure !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works extremely well
reviews.reviewText: definitely worth the purchase. It will remove dirt cleanser did not remove.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This toner is one of the best toner I have ever used. It is not too watery but also not too sticky. Very hydrating!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars heals skin well
reviews.reviewText: scorisisis and excima skin is soft and smooth and the itching is mostly gone. No scent but it works well
